title: Episode 40: Atheist Church, Tim Tebow & the Boy Scouts
description: A theme song sung by Yoda, then... church for atheists?  And what do Tim Tebow, the Boy Scouts and Southern Baptists all have in common?  Cap it all off with a wrap-up song that goes a little better than last week's!
